skillTree.name: Barded Warhorse
skillTree.description: A general's horse can be their most trusted and daring companion. Just don't name him 'Daisy'.

skillTree.name: Imperial Pegasus
skillTree.description: An Imperial pegasus is a noble, winged steed, intelligent and loyal.

skillTree.name: Imperial Griffon
skillTree.description: Once trained to carry a man in battle, Imperial griffons are poised killers and incredibly dedicated to their riders.

skillTree.name: Brass-Lunged
skillTree.description: This Lord belts out orders and can be heard even across a battlefield smothered in the grim noise of war.

skillTree.name: Sigmar’s Ward
skillTree.description: The relentless drive and fury of the Hammer, harnessed for the protection of this ward’s bearer.

skillTree.name: Mentor
skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +35%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +50%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Gunpowder & Lead
skillTree.description: For Ostlanders gun ownership is more important than basic personal hygiene, they also love tinkering with their weapons and as such many of their weapons have double barrels.

effects.description:
Passive ability: "Sure & True" for Handgunners, Outriders and War Wagon units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +10% for Handgunners, Outriders and War Wagon units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Staunch Defenders
skillTree.description: Like his father before him, he has spent a lifetime fighting against Chaos warbands, raiding Norse, and marauding Orcs, not to mention the occasional forays of bandits from Kislev.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +12% for Spearmen and Halberdiers
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +8 for Spearmen and Halberdiers
	(Lord's army)
Recruit rank: +3 for Spearmen and Halberdiers

skillTree.name: Stubborn as a Mule
skillTree.description: "Those bull-headed Ostlanders really will eat anything..."

effects.description:
Melee attack: +8 for all units when defending
	(Lord's army)

Physical resistance: 10% for all units when defending
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Margrave of the Northern March
skillTree.description: Ostland has tasted the lash of Chaos and their hatred of the evil ones knows no bounds.

skillTree.name: Hammer of the East
skillTree.description: At the head of his armies Valmir has fought against bandits, barbaric Orcs and Goblins, savage Beastmen, seaborne Norse raiding parties and marauding Chaos warbands. He is widely considered one of the most warlike leaders of The Empire.

effects.description:
Character experience gain: +30%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

Experience gain for units: +100% when fighting against the Forces of Chaos
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Full Plate Armour
skillTree.description: Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Deadly Blade
skillTree.description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Blade Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.name: Inspiring Presence
skillTree.description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Emperor's Finest
skillTree.description: “We march to war for our Emperor, and Sigmar, our saviour and lord.”

effects.description:
Melee defence: +4 for Spearmen, Swordsmen, Flagellants, and Halberdiers units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Spearmen, Swordsmen, Flagellants, and Halberdiers units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +4 for Spearmen, Swordsmen, Flagellants, and Halberdiers units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Spearmen, Swordsmen, Flagellants, and Halberdiers units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Spearmen, Swordsmen, Flagellants, and Halberdiers units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Speed of Horse
skillTree.description: These steeds are bred for speed and war, but foremost it is their gallop which marks them out.

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +6 for Empire Knights, Reiksguard, and Knights of the Blazing Sun units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +6 for Empire Knights, Reiksguard, and Knights of the Blazing Sun units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +6 for Empire Knights, Reiksguard, and Knights of the Blazing Sun units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +9 for Empire Knights, Reiksguard, and Knights of the Blazing Sun units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +9 for Empire Knights, Reiksguard, and Knights of the Blazing Sun units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Pistolkorps
skillTree.description: This Lord expects his men to practice the disciplines of the Pistolkorps, and all be expert marksmen.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +4% for Free Company Militia, Crossbowmen, Huntsmen, Archers, Handgunners, Pistoliers and Outriders units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +10% for Free Company Militia, Crossbowmen, Huntsmen, Archers, Handgunners, Pistoliers and Outriders missile units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +6% for Free Company Militia, Crossbowmen, Huntsmen, Archers, Handgunners, Pistoliers and Outriders units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +20% for Free Company Militia, Crossbowmen, Huntsmen, Archers, Handgunners, Pistoliers and Outriders missile units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +8% for Free Company Militia, Crossbowmen, Huntsmen, Archers, Handgunners, Pistoliers and Outriders units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Honest Steel
skillTree.description: Honest Empire-forged steel is all a state trooper could ask when confronting the myriad foes in battle.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +6% for Greatswords and Demigryph Knights units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +6 for Greatswords and Demigryph Knights units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +9% for Greatswords and Demigryph Knights units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +12 for Greatswords and Demigryph Knights units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +12% for Greatswords and Demigryph Knights units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Mighty Forge
skillTree.description: Patrons of great forges and smiths expect, and are rewarded with, tougher and more enduring war machines.

effects.description:
Ward save: 7% for War Wagon, Steam Tank and Luminark of Hysh units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +4% for War Wagon, Steam Tank and Luminark of Hysh units
	(Lord's army)

Ward save: 11% for War Wagon, Steam Tank and Luminark of Hysh units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +8% for War Wagon, Steam Tank and Luminark of Hysh units
	(Lord's army)

Ward save: 15% for War Wagon, Steam Tank and Luminark of Hysh units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Imperial Gunnery
skillTree.description: Despite what the Dwarfs think, no other race can bring to bear such devastating artillery volleys.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +4% for Mortar, Great Cannon, Helblaster Voley Gun, and Helstorm Rocket Battery units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +10% for Mortar, Great Cannon, Helblaster Voley Gun, and Helstorm Rocket Battery units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +6% for Mortar, Great Cannon, Helblaster Voley Gun, and Helstorm Rocket Battery units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +20% for Mortar, Great Cannon, Helblaster Voley Gun, and Helstorm Rocket Battery units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +8% for Mortar, Great Cannon, Helblaster Voley Gun, and Helstorm Rocket Battery units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Strength of Hardship
skillTree.description: The frontline will either make or break you. Those who survive become the backbone of any army.

effects.description:
Leadership: +5 for Spearmen, Swordsmen, Flagellants, Huntsmen and Empire Knights units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for Spearmen, Swordsmen, Flagellants, Huntsmen and Empire Knights units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Spell resistance: 15% for Spearmen, Swordsmen, Flagellants, Huntsmen and Empire Knights units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Sharpshooter
skillTree.description: The veteran marksman knows the precise range required to land the killing shot.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +12% for Free Company Militia, Crossbowmen, Huntsmen, Archers, Handgunners, Pistoliers and Outriders units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +10% for Free Company Militia, Crossbowmen, Huntsmen, Archers, Handgunners, Pistoliers and Outriders units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for Free Company Militia, Crossbowmen, Huntsmen, Archers, Handgunners, Pistoliers and Outriders units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Taste for Battle
skillTree.description: Some men grow to relish war, dulled to the pain and living solely for the thrill of the kill.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +5 for Greatswords, Halberdiers, Reiksguard, Knights of the Blazing Sun, and Demigryph Knights units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for Greatswords, Halberdiers, Reiksguard, Knights of the Blazing Sun, and Demigryph Knights units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Physical resistance: 10% for Greatswords, Halberdiers, Reiksguard, Knights of the Blazing Sun, and Demigryph Knights units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Artillery Master
skillTree.description: Those in command of ordnance can potentially decide a battle before the melee has even begun.

effects.description:
Ammunition: +20% for Mortar, Great Cannon, Helblaster Volley Gun, Helstorm Rocket Battery, War Wagon, Luminark of Hysh and Steam Tank units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +12% for Mortar, Great Cannon, Helblaster Volley Gun, Helstorm Rocket Battery, War Wagon, Luminark of Hysh and Steam Tank units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +10% for Mortar, Great Cannon, Helblaster Volley Gun, Helstorm Rocket Battery, War Wagon, Luminark of Hysh and Steam Tank units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.name: Iron Disciplinarian
skillTree.description: This Lord expects utter obedience from the smallfolk, and has little time for insurrections or petty revolts.

skillTree.name: Leader of Renown
skillTree.description: Revered by the masses, such a celebrated leader will inspire many new recruits.

skillTree.name: Reassuring Presence
skillTree.description: The presence of this Lord ensures a measure of calm, reducing panic and desertion amongst followers.

effects.description:
Attrition: -15% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -25% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -35% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Fervent
skillTree.description: Through our acts, the gods will cleanse the lands.

skillTree.name: Elector Count
skillTree.description: As an elected governing official of the Empire, an Elector Count has the power and authority to raise troops from his home province. In times of need, or if a regiment is being raised by the right individual, the Count may grant his favor to a unit.

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Quartermaster
skillTree.description: A good quartermaster can ration equipment and foodstuffs efficiently, making supplies last longer.

skillTree.name: Logistician
skillTree.description: Proficient with figures, this Lord, or his subordinates, can keep his army fulfilled, even in dire circumstances.

skillTree.name: Alert
skillTree.description: Countless conflicts and a keen sense of awareness have made this Lord difficult to entrap.

effects.description: Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +5%
Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +10%

skillTree.name: Headhunter
skillTree.description: "Ever thought about joining the Elector's troops, chief? You'd make a good soldier alright."

backgroundSkills.name: Elector Count of Ostland
backgroundSkills.description: Valmir von Raukov is a tough warlord whose constant vigil has protected the northern borders of the Empire for many years.

effects.description:
Attribute: Expert Charge Defence for Spearmen units
	(Lord's army)

factionEffects.title: Margrave of the Northern March
factionEffects.description: The Elector Counts of Ostland live on the northeastern border of the Empire beyond which lie the wild and dangerous Troll country and the Northern Wastes. It has always been a poor region where the constant threat of danger breeds a hardy race of people. The Elector Count of Ostland is Valmir von Raukov. Like his father before him, he has spent a lifetime fighting against Chaos warbands, raiding Norse, and marauding Orcs, not to mention the occasional forays of bandits from Kislev.

effects.description: Has access to unique building which grants access to Ogre Maneater units (requires the Ogre Kingdom DLC)
Attribute: Formation Attack for Spearmen and Halberdiers units
